parameters.name: AllKeyPrefix
parameters.description: Whether to match all file prefixes.

parameters.name: Enable
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the bucket check policy. Valid values:

*   **1**: enables the bucket check policy.
*   **0**: disables the bucket check policy.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end time of the check. Specify the time in the HH:mm:ss format.

parameters.name: KeyPrefixList
parameters.description: The prefixes of the object that you want to check.

parameters.name: KeySuffixList
parameters.description: The suffixes of the objects that you want to check.

parameters.name: ScanDayList
parameters.description: The time when the check is performed. The value specifies the days of the week.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The start time of the check. Specify the time in the HH:mm:ss format.
